metadata.dc:author: Rodó Salas, Juan
metadata.dc:description: We present the case of a child presenting vesicoureteral reflux after ureteral reimplantation and endoscopic treatment. In a second cistoscopy to repeat endoscopic treatment a new orifice in the medium third of the tunnel of the previous ureteral reimplantation was discovered. This orifice acted as a shunt and maintained reflux. The patient was treated by further occlusion of the orifice with another injection of "Dextranómero/Nasha".
metadata.dc:title: Una buena solución para un mal caso.
[A good solution for a bad case].
